sql.name: SQL_SELECT_CUSTOMER_BY_CELLPHONE_FOR_UPDATE
sql.value: select customer_id, user_name, cell_phone, email from account where cell_phone = ? for update

sql.name: SQL_INSERT_CUSTOMER
sql.value: insert into account(user_name, cell_phone, email, create_date) values(?, ?, ?, ?)

sql.name: SQL_SELECT_ACTOR_BY_CELLPHONE_AND_ACCOUNT_FOR_UPDATE
sql.value: select customer_id, actor_id, real_name, sex, cell_phone, create_date, update_date from actor where cell_phone = ? and customer_id = ? for update

sql.name: SQL_INSERT_ACTOR
sql.value: insert into account(customer_id, real_name, sex, cell_phone, create_date) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
